title: Social Media-Enhanced Online Mathematics Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Concepts and Experience with Online Learning Tools
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment combining simulation/VR tools for mathematical problem-solving with social media platforms. Learners access diverse tools via personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners execute collaborative strategies with peers in the mathematics problem-solving process on social media platforms at least three times.
Learners explain complex mathematical concepts with over 80% accuracy by integrating simulation/VR environments with social media.
Learners submit formative assessment tasks with 100% completion using a social media-based feedback system.

resources: BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) Learning Guide

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
